title: The Heritage of the Hills
author: Hankins, Arthur Preston, 1880-1932

quoteLast: . The chart-house and part of the bridge were blown to pieces. Three dull, splintering crashes ensued in rapid succession, proving beyond question that the bombs were set to automatically explode at a given time.
title: West Wind Drift
author: McCutcheon, George Barr, 1866-1928
